alert.note: Alert for East Bay Hills; Eastern Santa Clara Hills; Northern Monterey Bay; Santa Cruz Mountains; Santa Lucia Mountains and Los Padres National Forest (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 27 at 8:45AM PDT until March 28 at 2:00PM PDT by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TO 2 PM PDT TUESDAY... ...FROST ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 9 AM PDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...South winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Santa Cruz Mountains, Eastern Santa Clara Hills, East Bay Hills, Santa Lucia Mountains and Los Padres National Forest and Northern Monterey Bay. * WHEN...From 5 AM to 2 PM PDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strongest winds are expected for the higher elevations of the East Bay Hills and Eastern Santa Clara Hills. Localized areas of higher terrain could see gusts greater than 55 mph.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: East Bay Hills; Eastern Santa Clara Hills; Northern Monterey Bay; Santa Cruz Mountains; Santa Lucia Mountains and Los Padres National Forest
